sources.title: The Housing Problem (1946)
sources.description: A topical post-WWII cartoon dealing with the shortage of housing for the returning military people and their families. In this one, though, the family having a housing problem is a family of pigs. They trail moving vans and investigate "For Rent" signs, and even try to move the dogs out of their kennel. Finally, they buy a prefabricated house, have a very hard time putting it together and, then, termites show up and destroy their new home. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-housing-problem-1946/

metadata.Plot: A topical post-WWII cartoon dealing with the shortage of housing for the returning military people and their families. metadata.Writer: John Foster, Tom Morrison, Paul Terry
